OrgName.entry: PATIENT ADVICE AND LIAISON SERVICE - SHEFFIELD TEACHING HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST

Desc.entry: Employed by the Trust, but acts as an independent representative for patients at the Royal Hallamshire, Northern General, Jessop Wing, Weston Park and Charles Clifford hospitals. Provides support for individual patients, their relatives and carers, and promotes the interests of the patients in general within the hospital and the community. Provides support and information to patients who have concerns, problems or complaints. Identifies areas for change and helps staff to develop patient-friendly services. Referrals accepted from any outpatient, inpatient, relative or carer.
